:list.description: An array of options, see "Basic Usage" above
:list.description_zh: 选项的数组，形式见上方"基本使用"

current.description: The index value of the option that is selected by default during initialization
current.description_zh: 初始化时默认选中的选项索引值

inactiveColor.description: The color when it is not activated

mode.description: For mode selection, see the "Mode Selection" description above
mode.description_zh: 模式选择，见上方"模式选择"说明

bold.description: Whether the font of the active option is bold
bold.description_zh: 激活选项的字体是否加粗

bgColor.description: The background color of the component is valid when the mode is set to button
bgColor.description_zh: 组件背景颜色，mode为button时有效

keyName.description: The name of the key read from the list element object
keyName.description_zh: 从list元素对象中读取的键名

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the segmenter option changes
events.description_zh: 分段器选项发生改变时触发
